description: Allows you to purchase reserved Elasticsearch instances.

parameters.name: ReservedElasticsearchInstanceOfferingId
parameters.description: The ID of the reserved Elasticsearch instance offering to purchase.

parameters.name: ReservationName
parameters.description: A customer-specified identifier to track this reservation.

nested_items.name: ReservedElasticsearchInstanceId
nested_items.description: Details of the reserved Elasticsearch instance which was purchased.

nested_items.name: ReservationName
nested_items.description: The customer-specified identifier used to track this reservation.
